Address.label: Address
Address.value: 224 AIRPORT PARKWAY, SAN JOSE, California, 95110, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Heritage Commerce Corp operates as a bank holding company. The company, through its subsidiary, offers commercial banking services to small and medium-sized businesses and their owners, managers, and employees. It operates through two segments, namely Banking and Factoring. The bank generates most of its revenue from the Banking segment.
